title: Earrings, "Cupids", ca. 1880
creditline: Gift of the estate and in memory of Robert B. Noyes
description: Both earrings have an enamel painting of a putto with flowers in a gold frame with five pendants of three lengths at the bottom.  The frame is covered wtih a design of blocks and scrolls with balls on the pendants, of hearts and flowers.  Forms a set with 1946-50-25.

exhibitions.title: Jewelry: A Selection from the Cooper-Hewitt Collection
